title: Fall Head Over Heels for These Comfortable Wedding Shoes
description: Don’t bring blisters on your honeymoon.
excerpt: Surely you don't want to bring blisters on your honeymoon. Shop the 24 most comfortable pairs of wedding shoes for bridesmaids, guests, and brides-to-be.

html:
Pearly Whites

Dolce Vita Kanika Pearl Mid Heels

Dolce Vita’s Kanika heels are finally back in stock, so don’t hesitate to jump on these. The timeless style makes them a must-have for any incoming events or occasions.

Sizes: 5-13

Colors: Vanilla Pearl

Material: Textile, synthetic, leather alternative

Heel height: 2.3 inches

Customer review: “GORGEOUS! Purchased for a bridal shower, very comfortable and classy! I have a wider foot and sometimes stray away from pointed toe shoes, but these fit just right!”

A Little Bling

Manolo Blahnik Hangisi 10 Crystal-Embellished Leather Flats

These Manolo Blahnik Hangisi flats feature the brand’s classic show-stopping crystal-embellished buckle, making these shoes a stand-out choice that’ll add all the sparkle you need.

Sizes: 6-12

Colors: White

Material: Leather

Heel height: 0.5 inches

Customer review: “Loved the style of these flats! They are so pretty to wear! A beautiful shoe from every angle. I really love looking at the beautiful crystal brooch on the shoe.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Ritz and Glitz

Sophia Webster Coco Glitter Crystal-Heel Pumps

If you’re looking for sparkle on your big day, turn to Sophia Webster’s glittering heels. This pair is perfect for dancing the night away, thanks to a crystal little kitten heel.

Sizes: 5-12

Materials: Leather

Colors: Champagne

Heel Height: 2.8 inches

Chic and Comfortable

Gianvito Rossi Bridal Ascent 55 Leather Slingback Pumps

This elegant pointed-toe slingback pump has a delicate buckle-fastening adjustable ankle strap, low kitten heel, and supple leather lining, making them the perfect option for a comfortable and chic bride.

Sizes: 5-12

Colors: White

Material: 100% leather (Calf)

Heel height: 2 inches

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

A Dainty Sandal

Nina Gaby Slide Sandal

These low-heel sandals with delicate bows are set on a cushioned footbed and wrapped block heel, making them a top choice for comfort. These would be ideal for a beach or spring/summer wedding, and you can keep them in your closet to wear after your big day!

Sizes: 5-11

Colors: White

Material: Synthetic lining, leather sole

Heel height: 1.5 inches

Pearls and Lace

Jimmy Choo Sacora 85

If you’re seeking a romantic ivory option, consider this Jimmy Choo sandal with a pearl adorning the V-cut peep toe. The ankle strap offers plenty of heel support, making this the perfect heel to say “I do!”

Sizes: 4-13

Colors: Ivory

Material: Lace, leather

Heel height: 3.3 inches

Customer review: “Beautiful shoes. Well made and so pretty. Comfortable and easy to wear.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

A Satin Slipper

Loeffler Randall Leonie Cream Ballet Flat

“Go flat! Pick a fun color or a patent black to elevate elegance,” says Lobkova. In other words, this is your sign to take advantage of the ballet flat renaissance.

Sizes: 5-12

Colors: 7 options

Material: Viscose, silk, bovine leather

Customer review: “They are wearable, walkable, and so chic...they fit exactly like ballet shoes from when I was a kid—super comfortable and no blisters.”

Trendsetting Sparkle

Alexandre Birman Isla Crystal Bridal 85

For something both timeless and trendsetting, go for the Isla Crystal Bridal 85 heel. The artfully curved stiletto heel gives the shoe a modern twist, and the crystal ornament set over moiré fabric makes this the perfect shoe for fashion-forward brides.

Sizes: 5-12

Colors: Off-White

Material: Leather, moiré, metal

Heel height: 3.4 inches

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Marriage Material

Larroudé﻿ Ines Pump

An editor-approved style, these slingback heels from Larroudé are equipped with memory foam cushioning and an adjustable ankle strap. A sensible and stylish option even after “I do.”

Sizes: 5-11

Colors: 10 options

Material: Leather

Heel height: 2.5 inches

Customer review: “I got these in two colors and tbh I want them in all the colors. The front is def slightly wider than the luxury fashion houses and the memory foam makes walking a whole lot more comfortable...highly recommend!”

Something Blue

Badgley Mischka Kamilah Pumps, Azure Blue

Just in case you’re still on the hunt for something blue, consider this satin blue Badgley Mischka pump with an eye-catching beaded detail. These Old Hollywood-esque pumps have a leather lining and adjustable strap, maximizing comfort and allowing you to dance with ease all night long!

Sizes: 5-11

Colors: Azure Blue, Soft White, Black

Material: Satin, leather

Heel height: 3.15 inches

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

A Delicate Kitten Heel

Reformation Stacy Heeled Sandal

The Stacy Heeled Sandal from Reformation is a charming kitten heel that has a flattering almond toe and a bow detail on the upper. These versatile sandals aren’t just for your big day—they can also become a staple in your shoe closet.

Sizes: 5-11

Colors: White Patent, Powder Pink Croc, Espresso Suede

Material: Bovine leather, patent finish

Heel height: 2 inches

Day-to-Night Drama

Alexandre Birman Clarita Platform Bridal 120

For the bride seeking heels with some drama, look no further! These Alexandre Birman heels feature a charming bow and some ankle-strap bling. Though they look sky-high, the platform provides stability and makes them comfortable for day-to-night wear.

Sizes: 5-12

Colors: White

Material: Satin seta royal

Heel height: 4.7 inches

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Romantic Lace

Stuart Weitzman Stuart Felicity 85 Pumps

These pumps feature a sharp pointed-toe, garden lace, and leather trim, with a feminine bow detail at the vamp. For brides who want an elegant lift and wearable comfort, these are ideal for a vintage-inspired or lace-adorned wedding dress.

Sizes: 5-11

Colors: White, Black

Material: Lace, lacquered Nappa leather

Heel height: 3.25 inches

Customer review: “This is the most comfortable heel in my closet. Felicity is well-cushioned with a perfectly finished leather lining. The heel is “balanced” and encourages “best posture”; it is comfortable to stand, walk, dance, and “work a room” while hosting an event...”

Elegant Glamour

Amina Muaddi Rosie Leather Crystal Bow Slingback Pumps

These classically elegant slingback pumps have a graceful, pointed silhouette adorned by a crystal-embellished decal resembling a swirling sun. The soft arch strap and low heel make these shoes comfortable for long periods of standing and dancing!

Sizes: 6-12

Colors: White

Material: Calf leather, rubber sole

Heel height: 2.36 inches

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Timeless Classic

Sarah Flint Perfect Pump 85

Follow the advice of Alexa Chung, and stick to the classics. Timelessly elegant, you’d never know that this Sarah Flint pump houses a wide-fitting toe box, contoured arch support, a secure steel stiletto, and 6mm of extra padding. Plus, if leather’s not your thing, these lifesaving heels are also available in white satin.

Sizes: 4-13

Colors: 24 options

Material: Calf leather

Heel height: 3.3 inches

Customer review: “These pumps live up to their name: perfect. I had stopped wearing high heels after spraining my ankle a decade or so ago. I couldn’t bear the idea of wearing flats to my daughter’s, wedding so I bought the Sarah Flint 85s thinking I would switch to flats after the ceremony and photos. To my surprise, I ended up wearing them all night and even for the car ride home. I have never worn a more comfortable pair of heels...comfortable right out of the box.”

A Touch of Pink

Reformation Noreen Slingback Pump

The pale pink heel and tiny bow accents add a touch of pastel and femininity to these Reformation pumps.

Sizes: 5-11

Colors: Almond, Black, Scarlet, Navy, Gold/Silver

Material: Bovine leather

Heel height: 3 inches

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Gold-Toned

Gucci Horsebit Sandal

These block heel sandals were a hit amongst reviewers, even apart from all the Gucci loyalists. Perfect for a bridal shower or elegant bachelorette, the gold horsebit adds just the right touch of shine.

Sizes: 4-12

Colors: White, Black

Material: Leather

Heel height: 3 inches

Customer review: “I am searching for comfy shoes to wear for my wedding so I chose these sandals...usually designer shoes run narrow on me and I can’t stand having a tight strap across the instep, but these fit across my instep nicely with a little bit of leeway.”

Arch Support System

Sarah Flint Wedding Perfect Block Sandal

Nobody does worry-free wedding shoes quite like Sarah Flint. These lacey block heels check all the boxes for top-tier comfort: a stable block heel, anatomical arch support, extra footbed padding, and an expanded toe-box.

Sizes: 4-13

Colors: White, Black, Gold, Sand

Material: Satin, leather

Heel height: 2.3 inches

Customer review: “I love these shoes! I have finicky feet but went to a 6 hour event including dancing and loved these sandals!”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Pearls, Pearls, and More Pearls

Betsey Johnson Sidny Ivory

If you plan to switch to sneakers before the dancing starts, these pearl-studded sneakers by Betsey Johnson are an impeccable choice! The platform offers a slight lift to give you some height while still maximizing comfort.

Sizes: 5-13

Colors: 22 options

Material: Manmade materials, textile lining, rubber, faux pearls

Heel height: 2 inches

Customer review: “These shoes are enjoyable, beautiful, and super comfortable. And I love that they can be found in wide widths. It's hard to find good shoes that are wide, and here are some amazing ones!”

A Satin Sandal

Margaux City Sandal

A tried-and-true sandal gets a bridal makeover in wedding-worthy satin and a crystal buckle.

Sizes: 4-12.5

Colors: 14 options

Material: Satin, leather

Heel height: 2.5 inches

Customer review: “Lovely sandal. It is perfect for my son’s wedding. At first I thought the heel strap was too big, but then I realized the straps slide and got the perfect fit. Can’t wait to wear them”
